docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: It was in the Fall of 1986 that I first saw the devil on the streets of Detroit.
docs.snippet: LEAD: It was in the Fall of 1986 that I first saw the devil on the streets of Detroit.

byline.original: By Ze'ev Chafets; Ze'ev Chafets is the author of ''Devil's Night: And Other True Tales of Detroit,'' to be published by Random House in October and from which this article is adapted. Copyright c 1990 by Ze'ev Chafets
